text.en: May the lotus feet of vajra masters remain for hundreds of aeons,
text.en-trans: dorjé lobpön zhabpé kal gyar ten

text.en: May the samaya vows of vajra brothers and sisters remain completely pure,
May the practices of the three vajras be perfected,
text.en-trans: dorjé sum gyi nyamlen tarchin né

text.en: And may we attain the supremely secret vajra in this very life!
text.en-trans: dorjé sang chok tsé dir drub gyur chik
